Perfect for organizing and customizing their study materials.Scan lesson planTeacherCamScanner has become my favorite teaching tool for lesson planning. I'm definitely an old-school pencil-and-paper kind of person when it comes to lesson planning, but I also like to keep a digital copy. I used to type everything out afterward, and it felt like I was doing double the work until I discovered CamScanner. Now, I just scan my handwritten plans and convert them into Word documents. I also organize everything into a lesson planning folder, so it's all easily accessible whenever I need it.Scan contractLawyerAs a practicing attorney, I deal with a mountain of paperwork—client documents, court filings, contracts, and handwritten notes from meetings. CamScanner has become one of my essential tools. I use it daily to scan documents on the go, especially when I'm in court or meeting clients outside the office. The scan quality is excellent, even for multi-page exhibits, and I can merge, annotate, and send files as PDFs within minutes. It's secure, efficient, and fits perfectly into the fast-paced legal workflow.Scan essayStudentAs a law student, I always need to make notes on hundreds of pages per lecture, but CamScanner app can do it all for me, I can scan and convert each page into a Word document, saving me tons of time and effort.Scan notesPhDGoing digital is the new normal. I've always been a pen & paper girlie throughout my PhD, which means I've ended up with stacks of notebooks. To keep things organized, I use CamScanner to scan and save them digitally. I can even convert handwritten notes directly into Word documents when I want to include them in my thesis, it's so much more efficient.Scan resumeJob SeekerAs a digital marketer, I always include a portfolio in my job applications to stand out—it proves my skills beyond what a resume can. With CamScanner, I scan and merge my work into polished PDFs that look far more professional than just photos. I can manage, share, and even get AI-powered suggestions for my resume, cover letter, and portfolio—all in one app. It's a complete tool for job seekers. Highly recommend starting your application process with CamScanner.Scan invoiceSmall BizThis app is really good and very very useful! Running a bakery means a ton of receipts, invoices, and handwritten orders. But now I scan and send signed delivery slips to clients in minutes by CamScanner. https://www.camscanner.com/zh/question-a.title: CamScanner Billing FAQs — Official Site
https://www.camscanner.com/zh/question-a.meta_description: CamScanner Official Billing Policy: Learn why charges occur, how to verify premium subscriptions, and step-by-step guides for managing and canceling auto-renewal on both iOS and Android devices. Help you manage your subscriptions, prevent unexpected charges, and get answers to renewal questions.
paragraphs:
FeaturesConverterPDF ToolsPremiumDownloadAPIEnglish简体中文繁體中文EnglishBahasa IndonesiaEspañolOnline ToolsSign InPDF to WordPDF to ExcelPDF to PPTPDF to JPGWord to PDFExcel to PDFPPT to PDFImage to PDFImage to TextMerge PDFSplit PDFDelete PDF PagesSort PDF PagesRotate PDFPDF SignaturePDF WatermarkPDF PasswordSmart TranslationImage to WordImage to ExcelScan BooksScan DocumentsScan ID CardImage to TextID Photo MakerCamScannerSubscription FAQsWhy was I charged by CamScanner?We understand that the unclear charges may have caused you some trouble. We will do our best to assist you in dealing with this situation. You may be charged for the following reasons:1. Uncanceled Free TrialYou may have subscribed to the premium free trial service, but did not cancel the subscription at least 24 hours before the end of the trial.2. Active subscription renewalYour premium subscription automatically renewed because it was not canceled at least 24 hours before the renewal date.When you subscribe, a window will pop up to remind you that this is an automatic renewal, and it will also display the renewal date, price, plan, and cancellation policy. After purchase, App Store or Google Play Store will also send you an email clearly stating the renewal date and how to cancel the subscription.
                If you're unsure about your subscription status, please check through the CamScanner app. Open the CamScanner app and go to Me > Account > Subscription Management to verify your current membership status.Also, please ensure no one else has used your account or device to activate a subscription.How do I confirm if I have a CamScanner Premium Membership subscription?Check your active subscriptions in your device's subscription management page:iOS usersGo to iPhone Settings or App Store > Apple ID > Subscriptions.Android usersOpen Google Play, go to Profile icon > Payments & subscriptions > Subscriptions.Huawei usersGo to Settings > Account centre > Payment and purchases > SubscriptionsYou can also check your membership status in the CamScanner app by going to the Me > Account > Subscription Management.How do I cancel auto-renewal?You can follow these steps below to manually turn off auto-renewal and avoid future charges. Simply deleting or uninstalling the app will NOT cancel your subscription.iOS Users: You can cancel it from App Store or viahttps://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039, and then initiate the refund viaRequest a refund for apps or content that you bought from Apple - Apple Support. To prevent automatic billing, you shall cancel your subscriptionat least 24 hours beforethe renewal date.If Google play, please cancel it from Google Play or viahttp://play.google.com/store/account/subscriptions.If Huawei, please cancel it from Huawei AppGallery or viahttps://consumer.huawei.com/uk/support/content/en-gb16002494/After cancellation, premium features will not expire immediately and will remain active until the end of the current billing period. You can continue using premium features until this period ends.How can I get further assistance?Please contact our customer support team through the CamScanner app: For Android users, go to Me > Feedback. For iOS users, go to Me > More settings > Suggestion & Feedback. You can also email us atsupport@camscanner.com, and a specialist will reach out to assist you.Terms of Service|Privacy Policy|Security & Compliance Center|Blog© 2025 INTSIG All rights reserved.

You may be charged for the following reasons:1. Uncanceled Free TrialYou may have subscribed to the premium free trial service, but did not cancel the subscription at least 24 hours before the end of the trial.2. Active subscription renewalYour premium subscription automatically renewed because it was not canceled at least 24 hours before the renewal date.When you subscribe, a window will pop up to remind you that this is an automatic renewal, and it will also display the renewal date, price, plan, and cancellation policy. After purchase, App Store or Google Play Store will also send you an email clearly stating the renewal date and how to cancel the subscription.
                If you're unsure about your subscription status, please check through the CamScanner app. Open the CamScanner app and go to Me > Account > Subscription Management to verify your current membership status.Also, please ensure no one else has used your account or device to activate a subscription.How do I confirm if I have a CamScanner Premium Membership subscription?Check your active subscriptions in your device's subscription management page:iOS usersGo to iPhone Settings or App Store > Apple ID > Subscriptions.Android usersOpen Google Play, go to Profile icon > Payments & subscriptions > Subscriptions.Huawei usersGo to Settings > Account centre > Payment and purchases > SubscriptionsYou can also check your membership status in the CamScanner app by going to the Me > Account > Subscription Management.How do I cancel auto-renewal?You can follow these steps below to manually turn off auto-renewal and avoid future charges. To prevent automatic billing, you shall cancel your subscriptionat least 24 hours beforethe renewal date.If Google play, please cancel it from Google Play or viahttp://play.google.com/store/account/subscriptions.If Huawei, please cancel it from Huawei AppGallery or viahttps://consumer.huawei.com/uk/support/content/en-gb16002494/After cancellation, premium features will not expire immediately and will remain active until the end of the current billing period. You can continue using premium features until this period ends.How can I get further assistance?Please contact our customer support team through the CamScanner app: For Android users, go to Me > Feedback. For iOS users, go to Me > More settings > Suggestion & Feedback. You can also email us atsupport@camscanner.com, and a specialist will reach out to assist you.

CamScanner Security and Compliance CenterCamScanner pays great attention to the network and data security of users, and is fully aware of the importance of network and data security. To this end, CamScanner makes full use of the advanced technical capabilities of "AI + Big Data" to implement intelligent data classification and grading, data leakage prevention (DLP), network security situation awareness and other measures to protect our systems and data, and insists on continuing to carry out our network and data security governance as a systematic and normalized work. At present, CamScanner has achieved many global certifications, and continues to provide users with safe and reliable products and services.CamScanner's CertificationsISO/IEC 27001 Information Security Management System CertificationRecognized as one of the most authoritative international standards in information security, the ISO/IEC 27001 certification demonstrates that CamScanner has established and implemented an information security management system that meets global standards.ISO/IEC 27701 Privacy Information Management System CertificationAs one of the most widely respected global standards for privacy protection, ISO/IEC 27701 certification affirms that CamScanner has implemented a privacy information management system in compliance with international regulations, ensuring secure and standardized processing of personal data.ISO/IEC 20000 IT Service Management System CertificationISO/IEC 20000 is an internationally recognized standard for IT service management. It signifies that the company has established an IT service management system aligned with global best practices.

CamScanner Security and Compliance CenterCamScanner pays great attention to the network and data security of users, and is fully aware of the importance of network and data security. To this end, CamScanner makes full use of the advanced technical capabilities of "AI + Big Data" to implement intelligent data classification and grading, data leakage prevention (DLP), network security situation awareness and other measures to protect our systems and data, and insists on continuing to carry out our network and data security governance as a systematic and normalized work. At present, CamScanner has achieved many global certifications, and continues to provide users with safe and reliable products and services.
